title: More Money And Less Weight, Financial Aid And Warming Up Your Vehicle
teaser: Those who vowed to save money in 2015 may want to look at a more practical way of paying for things. In this week’s On Your Money, financial planner Kevin McKinley explains to Joy Cardin how a certain approach can make you richer – and in some cases, healthier. Plus, he discusses why he says now is the time to think about financial aid for college, and the cost of warming up your vehicle before you drive.
